whereas GWG between week 14 and week 36 was associated with increased adiposity only when weight gain 
exceeded 500g/week [76]. Interestingly, CVD risk increased in association with increasing GWG between week 
14 and week 36 [76]. Cohort and observational studies in obese women suggest that a GWG even lower than 
recommended by the IoM [97] can have positive effects on pregnancy outcomes [43,44,98,99]. However, these 
results should be interpreted with caution and the potential
